title: Elanco CEO: Gaining Market Share Via ‘Major' Innovations
description:
Jeff Simmons, Elanco Animal Health CEO, discusses pet-care growth with Katie Greifeld at the JPMorgan Healthcare Conference on “The Close.” He says the company is focused on pets, cattle and poultry.
 (Source: Bloomberg)
